metadata.title: CVE-2023-51782 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.6.8. rose_ioctl innet/rose/af_rose.c has a use-after-free because of a rose_accept racecondition.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.4.0-1098.105').
